html:
Verb[edit]

iacuerim

  1. first-person singular perfect active subjunctive of iaceō
    1. "I may have lain prostrate, I may have lain down; I may have reclined"
    2. "I may have lain ill, I may have been sick"
    3. "I may have lingered, I may have tarried"
    4. "I may have been placed or situated, I may have lain"
    5. "I may have been low, flat or level"
    6. "I may have lain still"
    7. "I may have lain dead"
    8. "I may have lain in ruins"
    9. "I may have hung down loose"
    10. (of the face or eyes) "I may have been fixed on the ground, I may have been cast down"
    11. "I may have been indolent, idle or inactive"
    12. "I may have lain dormant or abandoned, I may have been of no avail"
    13. "I may have lain overthrown; I may have been refuted; I may have been despised"
    14. (of speech or language) "I may have been languid, dull or lifeless"
